attributes.action: make it impossible for signatories on this site to replace their names with their points of view .
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are people that lack any desire to use this site as it was designed, other than to denigrate the petitions put forward by others. By enscribing their signatures as gormless comments, they endeavour to pour scorn on legitimate requests! Petitions such as : ( STOP! Funding other countries etc ) and ( Save Britishness ), are two that have been vandalised by some faceless individuals who do not appear to have a petition to put forward themselves ! Please put a stop to this empty headed behaviour on this board !

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
